| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |

| Develop payment infrastructure | Enhance payment system stability and security | ☑️ | ☑️ | ☑️ | ☑️ | ☑️ | ☑️ |
| Collaborate with banks | Establish partnerships with banks to expand payment options |  |  | ☑️ | ☑️ |  |  |
| Offer promotions | Provide various promotions to increase usage of Cafe24 payment system | ☑️ | ☑️ | ☑️ | ☑️ | ☑️ | ☑️ |
| Improve mobile payment | Optimize payment system for mobile devices | ☑️ | ☑️ | ☑️ |  |  |  |
| Increase payment gateway options | Add more payment gateway options for shopping malls |  |  |  | ☑️ | ☑️ | ☑️ |
| Develop API capabilities | Develop and improve API to support third-party payment systems |  |  | ☑️ | ☑️ |  |  |
| Enhance fraud prevention | Enhance fraud detection and prevention measures |  |  |  |  | ☑️ | ☑️ |
